Package src.java.query

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    QueryProcessor
    Takes an Index and process it to obtain certain results that then stores on a List of Query objects.
    QueryReader
    A reader of a file that contains queries for the Index.
    QueryResultWriter
    A writer for the results of the queries after they have been processed.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColumnResultWriter
    An implementation of QueryResultWriter, writes the query results on disk with the following format:
    query_id doc_id doc_score 1 1 4 1 4 4 ...
    DisjuntiveQueryProcessor
    An implementation of QueryProcessor assumes disjunctive (“OR”) queries: all words in a query are combined using the OR operator.
    DisjuntiveSearchEngineBuilder
    A derived class from SearchEngineBuilder, builds a SearchEngine with a DisjuntiveQueryProcessor.
    Query
    An object representation of a query.
    QueryLoader
    An implementation of QueryReader.
    SearchEngine
    This class is responsible for loading the queries, process them and saving them into a file.
    SearchEngineBuilder
    This abstract class serves as a starting point for the an implementation of the builder pattern with the purpose of creating an instance of a SearchEngine.
